description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jake's Room is a 3rd person, zero-g flightsim shooter. It has two modes, single player and two player split-screen co-op. It takes place in a room filled with toys. The object of the game is to fly around the room avoiding and destroying toys and other various items.
description.short: Jake's Room is a 3rd person, zero-g flightsim shooter. It has two modes, single player and two player split-screen co-op. It takes place in a room filled with toys. The object of the game is to fly around the room avoiding and destroying toys and other various items.
